query:
UPDATE jobs
                        SET status = 'completed',
                            audio_url = $1,
                            duration_seconds = $2,
                            actual_runtime_ms = $3,
                            deepinfra_cost = $4,
                            deepinfra_request_id = $5,
                            storage_type = $6,
                            ipfs_cid = $7,
                            crust_order_id = $8,
                            pinning_cost = $9,
                            completed_at = NOW()
                        WHERE id = $10
